name.japanese: ヒトヒトの実 モデル:大仏
name.romanized: Hito Hito no Mi, Moderu: Daibutsu

description: A Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a giant golden Buddha (Daibutsu) at will, granting immense size, strength, and the ability to generate powerful shockwaves.

abilities.description: The user transforms into a giant golden Buddha figure, significantly increasing their size and physical power.
abilities.visualDescription: Sengoku becomes a massive golden Buddha statue with glowing form.

abilities.description: The user can generate massive shockwave attacks from their palms while in Buddha form, capable of destroying large structures.
abilities.visualDescription: Powerful shockwave emanates from Buddha form's palms, strong enough to destroy the execution platform.

weaknesses.description: User cannot swim and is weakened by Sea Stone and seawater.

keyMoments.title: First Transformation
keyMoments.description: Sengoku transforms into his Buddha form for the first time in the series, revealing his Devil Fruit ability to everyone present.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of the Fleet Admiral's Devil Fruit power, showing why he holds the highest Marine position.

trivia: Many Marines claimed they had never seen Sengoku use this power before the Marineford War.
The Daibutsu (Great Buddha) is a common Buddhist statue in Japan, representing enlightenment and wisdom.
This is one of the few Mythical Zoan Devil Fruits shown in the series.
